name: Mini Miner (Prototype)
description:
One bright and sunny day Lily was outside playing with her toys when suddenly she trips and falls down a well... and discovers a whole new world...

This game is about mining ore, slaying monsters and finding treasure. And you'll use the money from doing that on upgrades and stuff for your room.

Because of development woes I'm not going to be developing this game any further. If you wish to use this idea for something of your own you may go ahead and do so.
